name: Boomerang Snack
description: Boomerang Snack is a snack bar located on Mexico Square. Here you can get a tasty snack, a soft drink or an ice cream.

name: Canadian Burger
description: Canadian Burger is a snack bar located on Canada Square. Here you can get a tasty snack, a soft drink or an ice cream.

name: Frituur
